ygData.subject: Re: Sigh - Armor woes
ygData.msgSnippet: Get the banded ... I saw a full set sell the other night for only 100pp. That s dirt cheap compared to the other options. It normally goes for higher than that
ygData.messageBody:
Get the banded ... I saw a full set sell the other night for only 100pp.
That's dirt cheap compared to the other options. It normally goes for higher
than that but with the increase in blacksmiths ... I see the prices
eventually reacing a low point. I play on the Erollisi Marr server and the
auction was in Freeport. Good luck and hopefully we will see your post about
your new full set of banded. :-)

-Faderic


Patricia Halas wrote:

> From: "Patricia Halas" <patty_halas@...>
>
> Working on getting ringmail from the Orcs and such in Highpass, but I am
> eager to get something better (and cheap!). How good is the stuff in
> Unrest? Got a couple of high level friends that keep trying to get me to
> come back to place, but I just can't motivate myself. It is either go to
> unrest or save up to buy banded. C'est la vie!
